The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Ares/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Double 
Punch/Injector/Manterror/Bumblebee:



Dark One looked back at the twelve warriors behind him that he could see, 
Double Punch cloaked and following.

He saw weapons fire in the distance.  He transformed into his jet fighter 
mode and let out a yell over the Alliance comm. frequencies.

"FOR THE ALLIANCE!" He armed his missiles and powered up his laser weapons.

Pyro transformed into his tank mode, the black tank driving full speed.

Scavenger transformed into his HUMV mode, arming his automatic rifles, 
driving at the greatest speed that he is able too.

Sixshot took the lead in his space fighter mode, gaining altitude for a 
strafing run.

Ares drove along in his yellowish tank mode, the four cannons in his current 
mode glistening in the sun.

The others followed in their beast and vehicle modes, powering up their 
weapon systems, eager for an easy victory.
